'''19w08b''' is the twenty-third [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.14]], released on February 20, 2019<ref>{{snap|19w08b|February 20, 2019}}</ref>, which fixes some bugs.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=19w08b|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|46094|Using fill/clone which replaces mobspawner and keeps its fire particle
|81202|Fishing line disappears when fishing hook is not in view.
|87942|Ender crystal beam does not appear when the ender dragon is out of view.
|91858|Ender crystal beams don't show when ender crystal is out of view.
|;dev
|137511|Pandas move while they're eating or hide their faces.
|141929|Campfire particles stay active in unloaded chunks.
|;prev
|144463|Missing some {{code|minecraft:textures}}.
|144469|Replacing same block at location will cause animation to stop/stuck and can crash if using other block type.
|144504|{{code|instant_health|instant_damage|d=and}} effect icon images incorrectly named.
}}</onlyinclude>
